lead_paragraph: GODFREY--Joseph, of New Rochelle, died July 2, 2016, at age 102. He was Regional Representative (Region II) for Social Security and founding Regional Representative (Region II) for Medicare. In retirement, his efforts as an active volunteer were recognized by many organizations as well as by induction into the Westchester County Senior Citizens Hall of Fame. He is survived by his sons, Henry and Jonathan, their spouses, three grandchildren, three great-grand-children, and many nieces and nephews. Funeral service Friday 12.30pm, Temple Israel of New Rochelle followed by interment at Sharon Gardens. For more information, Zion Memorial Chapel 914-381-1809. 1/3
